# incidentio Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "incidentio" {
  api_key = "" # you incident.io API key here
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) API key. You can also set the `INCIDENT_IO_API_KEY` environment variable instead.
